item.title: The preparation of tinder from a certain thorn tree
item.summary: The preparation of tinder. In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.10. 4761 rev.4764 rev., note). Tinder–making, by |han≠kass’o (L VIII.-28. 8472 and 8473). Tinder is made from a certain thorn tree (called !kou).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book V-10
item.author: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)

keyword.subkw: and the use of the tinderbox
the preparation of tinder from a certain thorn tree
of a thorn tree from which tinder is prepared
and the preparation of tinder from a certain thorn tree
